name: Alpha base
description:
My submission for the 72 hour SA game jam for categories: Hobbyist, best technical and overall.

Used assets:
starfield skybox - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox-92717
progress bars pro - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/health-and-progress-bars-pro-82405
Voxel importer - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/p/voxel-importer-62914
Voxel arsenal - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/voxel-arsenal-136540
Quick outline - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/p/quick-outline-115488
Battle music pack - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/battle-music-pack-4...

Tools:
Unity 2020.1.x
Jetbrains Rider
Qubicle
Blender (For the giant asteroid the map sits on!)

Song of my jam - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8CixUgOl-fA

Pro tip - Shoot at the bombs to move them out of harms way!

Making of - coming soon!

Thanks for playing!
